sentences.en: But its decline across Europe is not uniform; in each country, the church faces a different mixture of threats and residual strengths.
sentences.cn: 但是，在欧洲这种萎缩并不均匀，在每一个国家，教会都面对着多种不同威胁和残余的优势。

sentences.en: Considerable residual stresses exist in the normal direction.
sentences.cn: 在其厚度方向存在着可观的残余应力.

sentences.en: Getter - ion pumps decrease chamber pressure by chemical reaction of residual gases with an evaporated metal.
sentences.cn: 吸气离子泵通过剩余气体与蒸发的金属之间的化学反应减少了内腔的压力.

sentences.en: One of the best tools we have against malaria is indoor residual house spraying.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有的抗击疟疾的最佳手段之一是室内残留喷洒。

sentences.en: Residual amounts of iron and aluminum dilute the phosphate content.
sentences.cn: 残采的铁铝降低了磷矿的含量.

sentences.en: residual income (=the money left from what you earn after you have paid your taxes)
sentences.cn: 税后收入

sentences.en: The component having a more localized source is referred to as residual.
sentences.cn: 由局部源产生的分量称为区域异常.

sentences.en: The final rinse may contain an antichlor to remove the residual chlorine from the fabric.
sentences.cn: 最后的水洗应加脱氯剂以去除织物上的残余氯.

sentences.en: The parent material can be either transported or residual.
sentences.cn: 母料可能是转移而来或积聚起来的.

sentences.en: the residual effects of drug treatment
sentences.cn: 药物治疗的残留作用

sentences.en: The residual impurities can effect wet - process production in several ways.
sentences.cn: 这些残留的杂质可能在几个方面影响湿法生产.

sentences.en: The residual nucleus will, in general, undergo a radioactive transformation.
sentences.cn: 剩余核一般说来将发生一次放射性衰变.

sentences.en: The resulting residual chromatism is known as secondary spectrum.
sentences.cn: 所得到的剩余色差叫做二次光谱.

sentences.en: The term pyelonephritis refers to immediate and residual effects of bacterial infection in the kidney.
sentences.cn: 肾盂肾炎一词系指肾脏遭细菌感染的直接或遗留后果.

sentences.en: There are still a few residual problems with the computer program.
sentences.cn: 电脑程序还有一些残留问题。

sentences.en: There are still a few residual problems with the computer program.
sentences.cn: 电脑程序还有一些残留问题。

sentences.en: There may be some residual disturbances in speech and gait.
sentences.cn: 言语和步态可能有一些残留障碍.

sentences.en: These, however, have been exposed to the digestive mercies of bacteria in the large intestine, and any residual goodies have been removed from them that way.
sentences.cn: 然而这些是被暴露到大肠消化道寄生细菌产生的结果，并且任何剩余糖分都是通过这种方式被移除的。

sentences.en: Turn the hotplate off and allow the residual heat to keep the mixture simmering.
sentences.cn: 把烤盘关掉，让余热把混合物再煨一下。

sentences.en: Weapon scientists developed the reduced residual radiation bomb.
sentences.cn: 武器科学家们研制了减弱遗留辐射的核弹.

words.tran_cn: 残留物；剩余；残渣；剩余遗产；社会渣滓

phrases.tran_cn: 剩余权益；[经]剩余索偿权
剩余糖分；香槟酒甜度；残留糖

trans.tran_en: remaining after a process, event etc is finished
